alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:55AM MST until December 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 2 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Grand Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 2 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
